posts.post_title: FS: Updated cards, several tough backs as well..Pied 42, Cycle 460, etc...
posts.post_content:
Updates have been made, sold cards removed and new ones added.....Please send me your email for pics if needed, my email is: [url]kmize1999@yahoo.com[/url]

PSA 7 Zack Wheat Pied 350-460, well centered, razor corners, card looks under graded to me.....$2250
PSA 7 Rube Marquard (hands at side) SCap 150 fact 649 overstrike, tough back, huge borders...$2250
PSA 7 Chief Bender (Port.) Pied 150, well centered, bright white borders...$2250
PSA 7.5 Paul Davidson SCap 350, perfect centering, razor sharp corners.....$1275
SGC 60 Hughie Jennings (both hands) CYCLE 460, tough HOFer......$1500
PSA 8OC Solly Hofman OLD MILL, centering is actually pretty good (regrade?), tough card in high grade with tough back....$795
PSA 7.5 Vive Lindaman Pied 150, one of the toughest to find in high grade.....$1950, NOW $1750
SGC 55 Frank Smith (Chicago & Bost.) PIEDMONT 42, looks like a 5....$1295, NOW $1150
SGC 86 George Brown (Chicago)...Impossible to find in high grade, $1895, NOW $1375
SGC 86 Hugh Jennings (both arms)...Tough HOFer in high grade...$1750, NOW $1595
SGC 84 Russ Ford (SOVEREIGN 460)....strong card....$695 , NOW $650
SGC 84 Boss Schmidt (Port.).....razor sharp corners, beautiful.....$495
GAI 7 Jack Chesbro Pied 150, perfect centering, original GAI holder.....$1350
PSA 6.5 Bill Sweeney (Bost.) OLD MILL, highest graded by any company....$595
SGC 82 Mordecai Brown (Chicago shirt) (TOLSTOI)
SGC 82 Walter Johnson (hands at chest) (TOLSTOI)
SGC 60 Eddie Collins (Purple variation)...must see to believe, 1st ever....$1750
PSA 5 Bill Donovan (Port.) EPDG, card also has freaky double registration and colors, incredibly neat card!.....$575
SGC 70 Zack Wheat (TOLSTOI)....huge white borders $1150
SGC 70 Bill Dahlen (Brooklyn)...Sharp corners...$1250, NOW $1195 
SGC 70 Frank Smith (Chicago & Bost.)....centered with sharp corners...$595 
PSA 6 Red Kleinow (Boston) POLAR BEAR...Tough front/back combo, 50/50 centering....$1295
Thanks for the inquiries and couple of sales. Lots of great cards available, some with tougher backs....

PM sent

posts.post_title: I give Kevin a big thumbs up
posts.post_content: I have bought several great cards from Kevin and give him my biggest of endorsements.

Thanks for the sales, still a bunch available...
More cards added, I have many more...Thanks
